linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or 18.04 LTS (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD Series card or
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 4.3
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 980 GTX or AMD Radeon 10270 HD Series card or higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 4.3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor with SSE2 support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11-compatible graphics card, such as NVIDIA GTX 470/AMD Radeon
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 4690/AMD FX 8370 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060/AMD RX 480 or higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
